entries: You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura.

variant.name: Shield (*) +1
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item +1 shield}}.
Mentre duguis l'escut, you have a +1 bonus to AC. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.
Mentre duguis l'escut, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.
You have a {=bonusWeaponAttack} bonus to attack rolls made with this weapon.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura.

variant.name: Shield (*) +2
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item +2 shield}}.
Mentre duguis l'escut, reps +2 a la CA. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.
Mentre duguis l'escut, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.
You have a {=bonusWeaponAttack} bonus to attack rolls made with this weapon.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura.

variant.name: Shield (*) +3
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item +3 shield}}.
Mentre duguis l'escut, you have a +3 bonus to AC. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.
Mentre duguis l'escut, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. Aquest bonus es suma al bonus normal de l'escut.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.
You have a {=bonusWeaponAttack} bonus to attack rolls made with this weapon.

The black blade of this sword is crafted from a mysterious arcane alloy. You gain a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. While the sword is on your person, you are immune to effects that turn undead.

entries.name: Dark Blessing
entries: While holding the sword, pots, com a acció, give yourself {@dice 1d4 + 4} punts de vida temporals. This property can't be used again until the next dusk.

entries.name: Disheartening Strike
entries: Quan impactes a una criatura with an attack using this weapon, you can fill the target with unsettling dread: the target has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn. The creature ignores this effect if it's immune to the {@condition acovardit} condition. Once you use this property, you can't do so again until the next dusk.

variant.name: Adamantine Munició
entries: Ammunition made of or coated with adamantine is unusually effective when used to break objects. Whenever a piece of adamantine ammunition hits an object, the hit is a critical hit.
The adamantine version of ten pieces of ammunition costs 500 gp more than the normal version, whether the ammunition is made of the metal or coated with it.
Whenever you hit an object using this ammunition, the hit is a critical hit.
This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, one of the hardest substances in existence. While you're wearing it, any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.

variant.name: Adamantine Weapon
entries: Melee weapons made of or coated with adamantine are unusually effective when used to break objects. Whenever an adamantine weapon hits an object, the hit is a critical hit.
The adamantine version of a melee weapon costs 500 gp more than the normal version, whether the weapon is made of the metal or coated with it.
Whenever you hit an object with this weapon, the hit is a critical hit.

An armblade is a arma màgica that attaches to your arm, becoming inseparable from you as long as you're attuned to it. To attune to this item, you must hold it against your forearm for the entire attunement period.

Com a acció bonus, you can retract the armblade into your forearm or extend it from there. While it is extended, you can use the weapon as if you were holding it, and you can't use that hand for other purposes.
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
This armor never gets dirty.
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}
{#itemEntry Armor of Resistència}

variant.name: Arrow of Slaying (*)
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item arrow of slaying}}.

An {@italic arrow of slaying} is a arma màgica meant to slay a particular kind of creature. Some are more focused than others; for example, there are both {@italic arrows of dragon slaying} and {@italic arrows of blue dragon slaying}. If a creature belonging to the type, race, or group associated with an {@italic arrow of slaying} de dany takes from the arrow, the creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17), taking an extra {@dice 6d10} de dany perforant si falla, or half as much extra damage on a successful one.
Once an {@italic arrow of slaying} deals its extra damage to a creature, it becomes a nonmagical arrow.
Other types of magic ammunition of this kind exist, such as bolts of slaying meant for a crossbow, though arrows are most common.

{=baseName/at} {=baseName/l} of slaying is a arma màgica meant to slay a particular kind of creature. Some are more focused than others; for example, there are both {@i {=baseName/l}s of dragon slaying} and {@i {=baseName/l}s of blue dragon slaying}. If a creature belonging to the type, race, or group associated with {=baseName/a} {=baseName/l} of slaying takes damage from the {=baseName/l}, the creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 17), taking an extra {@dice 6d10} de dany perforant si falla, or half as much extra damage on a successful one.
Once {=baseName/a} {=baseName/l} of slaying deals its extra damage to a creature, it becomes a nonmagical {=baseName/l}.

Barding is armor designed to protect an animal's head, neck, chest, and body. Any type of armor shown on the Armor table in this chapter can be purchased as barding. The cost is four times the equivalent armor made for humanoids, and it weighs twice as much.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. A més, while you are attuned to this weapon, your punts de vida màxims increases by 1 for each level you have attained.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This axe is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the axe, keeping it within reach at all times. You also have disadvantage on attack rolls with weapons other than this one, unless no foe is within 60 feet of you that you can see or hear.

Whenever a hostile creature damages you while the axe is in your possession, you ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15). Si falla, go berserk. While berserk, you must use your action each round to attack the creature nearest to you with the axe. If you can make extra attacks as part of the Attack action, you use those extra attacks, moving to attack the next nearest creature after you fell your current target. If you have multiple possible targets, you attack one at random. You are berserk until you start your turn with no creatures within 60 feet of you that you can see or hear.

When you attack a creature with this arma màgica and roll a 20 on the attack roll, the creature ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15) in addition to suffering the attack's normal effects. Si falla, the creature is restrained and must make another Constitució saving throw al final de cada torn seu. If it successfully saves against this effect three times, the effect ends. Si falla its saves three times, it is turned to stone and subjected to the {@condition petrificat} condition durant 1 hora.
A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to damage of the weapon's type, does not have a body made of flesh, or has legendary actions.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon. Whenever you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 1 on the attack roll, you ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, be {@condition restrained} and forced to make additional saves against being {@condition petrificat}, as above.
You can doff this armor as an action.
You gain a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

When you hit an undead creature with an attack using this weapon, the attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage of the weapon's type, and the creature has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead fins el final del teu proper torn.

Pots, com a acció bonus, toss this magic sword into the air and speak the paraula màgica. When you do so, the sword begins to hover, flies fins a 30 peus, and attacks one creature of your choice within 5 feet of it. The sword uses your attack roll and ability score modifier to damage rolls.

While the sword hovers, pots, com a acció bonus, cause it to fly fins a 30 peus to another spot within 30 feet of you. As part of the same bonus action, you can cause the sword to attack one creature within 5 feet of it.

After the hovering sword attacks for the fourth time, it flies fins a 30 peus and tries to return to your hand. If you have no hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet. If the sword has no unobstructed path to you, it moves as close to you as it can and then falls to the ground. It also ceases to hover if you grasp it or move more than 30 feet away from it.
Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

The first time you attack with the sword on each of your turns, you can transfer some or all of the sword's bonus to your Armor Class, instead of using the bonus on any attacks that turn. For example, you could reduce the bonus to your attack and damage rolls to +1 and gain a +2 bonus to AC. The adjusted bonuses remain in effect fins el final del teu proper torn, although you must hold the sword to gain a bonus to AC from it.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

When you hit a dragon with this weapon, the dragon takes an extra {@dice 3d6} damage of the weapon's type. For the purpose of this weapon, "dragon" refers to any creature with the dragon type, including dragon turtles and wyverns.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura. This armor loses its enchantment bonus permanently if it is exposed to sunlight durant 1 hora or longer.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. This weapon loses its enchantment bonus permanently if it is exposed to sunlight durant 1 hora or longer.

Pots, com a acció bonus, speak this magic sword's paraula màgica, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed llum forta en un radi de 40 peus i llum tènue uns 40 peus adicionals. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany de foc to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to speak the paraula màgica again or until you drop or sheathe the sword.
When you hit with an attack using this magic sword, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} de dany de fred. A més, while you hold the sword, tens resistència al dany de foc.
In freezing temperatures, the blade desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.
When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

Choose a magical bonus of +1 to +3. This sword gains that bonus to its attack and damage rolls. For each point of bonus you choose for the sword, you take a corresponding penalty (−1 to −3) to your salvades de mort. You can change this magical bonus each day at dawn.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

When you hit a giant with it, the giant takes an extra {@dice 2d6} damage of the weapon's type and ha de salvar per Força (CD 15). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}. For the purpose of this weapon, "giant" refers to any creature with the giant type, including ettins and trolls.
This weapon is fashioned from infernal iron and traced with veins of focferni that shed dim light in a 5-foot-radius.
Any humanoid killed by an attack made with this weapon has its soul funneled into the River Styx, where it's reborn instantly as a {@creature lemure} devil.
Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. When you hit a fiend or an undead with it, that creature takes an extra {@dice 2d10} de dany radiant.

While you hold the drawn sword, it creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around you. You and all creatures friendly to you in the aura have advantage on salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics. If you have 17 or more levels in the paladin class, the radius of the aura increases to 30 feet.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one fire damage roll of the spell.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one radiant damage roll of the spell.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one acid or poison damage roll of the spell.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one lightning or thunder damage roll of the spell.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one necrotic damage roll of the spell.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one cold damage roll of the spell.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one force damage roll of the spell.
An imbued wood focus is a rod, staff, or wand cut from a tree infused with extraplanar energy. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this item as a spellcasting focus.
When you cast a damage-dealing spell using this item as your spellcasting focus, Tens un +1 a one psychic damage roll of the spell.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura, which shimmers softly.

If you die while wearing the armor, it is destroyed, and each celestial, fey, and fiend with 30 feet of you ha de salvar per Carisma (CD 15). Si falla, be banished to its home plane of existence, unless it is already there.

This hideous armor is formed from black chitin, beneath which veins pulse and red sinews glisten. To attune to this item, you must wear it for the entire attunement period, during which tendrils on the inside burrow into you.
Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to Armor Class, and tens resistència al dany the following types: necrotic, poison, and psychic.

entries.name: Symbiotic Nature
entries: The armor can't be removed from you while you're attuned to it, and you can't voluntarily end your attunement to it. If you're targeted by a spell that ends a curse, your attunement to the armor ends, and it detaches from you.

The armor requires fresh blood be fed to it. Immediately after you finish any long rest, you must either feed half of your remaining Hit Dice to the armor (arrodonint a l'alça) or take 1 level of {@condition exhaust}.

variant.name: Luck Blade
entries: Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. While the sword is on your person, you also gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.

entries.name: Luck
entries: If the sword is on your person, you can call on its luck (no requereix acció) to reroll one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw you dislike. You must use the second roll. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Desig
entries: The sword has {@dice 1d4 - 1} charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge and cast the {@spell desig} spell from it. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba. The sword loses this property if it has no charges.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. While the sword is on your person, you also gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.

entries.name: Luck
entries: If the sword is on your person, you can call on its luck (no requereix acció) to reroll one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw you dislike. You must use the second roll. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

entries.name: Desig
entries: The sword has {@dice 1d4 - 1} charges. While holding it, pots, com a acció, expend 1 charge and cast the {@spell desig} spell from it. This property no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba. The sword loses this property if it has no charges.

Mentre vesteixis l'armadura, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed. A més, whenever you start your turn underwater with 0 hit points, the armor causes you to rise 60 feet toward the surface. The armor is decorated with fish and shell motifs.

Mind flayers can turn any nonmagical sword into a mind blade. Only one creature can attune to it: either a specific mind flayer or one of its thralls. In the hands of any other creature, the mind blade functions as a normal sword of its kind. In the hands of its intended wielder, the mind blade is a arma màgica that deals an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany psíquic to any target it hits.

Any nonmagical suit of heavy armor can be turned by mind flayers into mind carapace armor. Only one creature can attune to it: either a specific mind flayer or one of its thralls. While worn by any other creature, the mind carapace armor functions as normal armor of its kind. To its intended wearer, the armor grants advantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws and makes its wearer immune to the {@condition acovardit} condition.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC mentre vesteixis l'armadura.

Mitrall is a light, flexible metal. A mitrall chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks or has a Força requirement, the mitrall version of the armor doesn't.

Mitrall is a light, flexible metal. A mitrall chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks or has a Força requirement, the mitrall version of the armor doesn't.

This suit of armor is reinforced with a magically enhanced metal alloy called mizzium, which is made in Izzet foundries. While you're wearing the armor, any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit. A més, when you are subjected to a magical effect that allows you to make a Força or Constitució saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw.
In darkness, the unsheathed blade of this sword sheds moonlight, creating llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals.
Tens un +2 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

The sword has {@dice 1d8 + 1} charges. If you score a critical hit against a creature that has fewer than 100 hit points, it ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 15). Si falla, be slain instantly as the sword tears its life force from its body (a construct or an undead is immune). The sword loses 1 charge if the creature is slain. When the sword has no charges remaining, it loses this property.
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take fire damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take radiant damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take acid or poison damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take lightning or thunder damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take necrotic damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take cold damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take force damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).
An orb of shielding is a polished, spherical chunk of crystal or stone aligned to one of the planes of existence. If you're a spellcaster, you can use this orb as a spellcasting focus.
If you're holding the orb when you take psychic damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by {@dice 1d4} (to a minimum of 0).

When you attack a creature with this arma màgica and roll a 20 on the attack roll, the creature ha de salvar per Saviesa (CD 15) in addition to suffering the attack's normal effects. Si falla, the creature also suffers the effects of a {@spell polimorfia} spell. Roll a d20 and consult the following table to determine the form the target creature is transformed into.
A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to damage of the weapon's type, is a shapechanger, or has legendary actions.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This weapon is cursed, and becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. Until the curse is broken with a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic, you are unwilling to part with the weapon. Whenever you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 1 on the attack roll, you suffer the effect of a {@spell polimorfia} spell durant 1 hora, rolling on the table to determine your new form.

variant.name: Silvered Munició
entries: Some monsters that have immunity or resistance to nonmagical weapons are susceptible to silver ammunition, so cautious adventurers invest extra coin to plate their ammunition in silver. You can silver ten pieces of ammunition for 100 gp. This cost represents not only the price of the silver, but the time and expertise needed to add silver to the ammunition without making it less effective.

variant.name: Silvered Weapon
entries: Some monsters that have immunity or resistance to nonmagical weapons are susceptible to silver weapons, so cautious adventurers invest extra coin to plate their weapons with silver. You can silver a single weapon for 100 gp. This cost represents not only the price of the silver, but the time and expertise needed to add silver to the weapon without making it less effective.
Wisps of harmless, odorless smoke rise from this armor while it is worn.

When you attack a creature with this arma màgica and roll a 20 on the attack roll, that target takes an extra 10 necrotic damage if it isn't a construct or an undead. You also gain 10 punts de vida temporals.
{@i Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 3d6} de dany necròtic, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}.}
When you attack an object with this magic sword and hit, maximize your weapon damage dice against the target.

When you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, that target takes an extra 14 slashing damage. Then roll another {@dice d20}. If you roll a 20, you lop off one of the target's limbs, with the effect of such loss determined by the DM. If the creature has no limb to sever, you lop off a portion of its body instead.
{@i Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 4d6} de dany tallant, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}}.

A més, you can speak the sword's command to cause the blade to shed llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals. Speaking the paraula màgica again or sheathing the sword puts out the light.
Tens un +1 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica.

entries.name: Maledicció
entries: This sword is cursed and possessed by a vengeful spirit. Becoming attuned to it extends the curse to you. As long as you remain cursed, you are unwilling to part with the sword, keeping it on your person at all times. While attuned to this weapon, you have disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

A més, while the sword is on your person, you must succeed on a DC 15 Saviesa saving throw whenever you take damage in combat. On a failed save you must attack the creature that damaged you until you drop to 0 hit points or it does, or until you can't reach the creature to make a melee attack against it.

You can break the curse in the usual ways. Alternativament, casting {@spell desterrament} on the sword forces the vengeful spirit to leave it. The sword then becomes a +1 weapon with no other properties.
Hit points lost to this weapon's damage can be regained only through a short or long rest, rather than by regeneració, magic, or any other means.

Un cop per torn, quan impactes a una criatura with an attack using this arma màgica, you can wound the target. A l'inici de cada torn de the wounded creature, it takes {@dice 1d4} de dany necròtic for each time you've wounded it, and it can then make a DC 15 Constitució saving throw, ending the effect of all such wounds on itself on a success. Alternativament, the wounded creature, or a creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to make una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Medicina}) amb CD 15, ending the effect of such wounds on it on a success.

variant.name: Vicious +1 Weapon
entries: When you roll a 20 with this arma màgica, the target takes an extra 7 damage of the weapon's type.
{@i Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 2d6} damage, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}.}
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.
When you roll a 20 with this arma màgica, the target takes an extra 7 {=dmgType} damage.
{@i Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 2d6} {=dmgType} damage, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}.}

variant.name: Vicious Weapon
entries: When you roll a 20 with this arma màgica, the target takes an extra 7 damage of the weapon's type.
{@i Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 2d6} damage, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}.}
When you roll a 20 with this arma màgica, the target takes an extra 7 {=dmgType} damage.
{@i Note: According to the SRD, it is an extra {@dice 2d6} {=dmgType} damage, although {@link this is incorrect|https://rpg.stackexchange.com/a/174522/53884}.}
Tens un +3 a attack and damage rolls made with this arma màgica. A més, the weapon ignores resistance to slashing damage.

When you attack a creature that has at least one head with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you cut off one of the creature's heads. The creature dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature is immune to this effect if it is immune to slashing damage, doesn't have or need a head, has legendary actions, or the DM decides that the creature is too big for its head to be cut off with this weapon. Such a creature instead takes an extra {@dice 6d8} de dany tallant from the hit.
This ammunition packs a wallop. A creature hit by the ammunition ha de salvar per Força (CD 10). Si falla, cau {@condition enderrocat}.
When you damage a creature with an attack using this arma màgica, the target can't regain hit points fins el final del teu proper torn.

This arma màgica warns you of danger. While the weapon is on your person, tens avantatge a tirades de initiative rolls. A més, you and any of your companions within 30 feet of you can't be surprised, except when {@condition incapacitat} by something other than nonmagical sleep. The weapon magically awakens you and your companions within range if any of you are sleeping naturally when combat begins.
